website_summaries.verdict: A perfect choice for someone hoping to effectively clean larger items, or a number of items all at once.
pros: We love having the ability to set custom timer settings
Jewelry comes out impressively shiny and clean, even with multiple items in the basket at once
Highly effective at cleaning electric tooth brush heads
cons: Stainless steel insert is not removable, so to dump out your dirty water, you must lift the entire unit

customer_reviews.title: A REAL FIRE HAZZARD!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! And a fire hazard...mine blew out with sparks flying and smoking, this thing could have been a fire hazard had I not been standing right there to unplug it. WOULD NOT RECCOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE ..only gave it 1 star because I had to in order to submit my review.
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Machine does not work turns blue but no water disruption.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money this ultrasonic is not an ultrasonic, if it has any ultrasonic vibration at all I can't find it. I used a Mercury test switch and nothing moved at all when I tested the water with the machine on. The little blue light comes on but that's it. It does not clean jewelry or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Carlysle

customer_reviews.title: Fire Safety
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the unit stop working and started creating smoke. during the time of smoke generation, I unplugged the unit to prevent what appeared to be an inevitable fire. This happened 31 days after purchasing the unit, rendering it impossible to return the unit to Amazon. I tried emailing customer support, however repetitively was given failure to receive messages in response. I'm really not sure what to do in this time of great hardship. I suppose I must find a better ultrasonic cleaner... Hopefully one that doesn't start a fire. Safety is of utmost importance.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: And yes it did a very good job. I want to thank you for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Famili ultrasonic cleaner: I thought the cleaner did not work at first, I couldn't see the bubbles so I put my finger tips in and I could feel them. It seemed to generate more bubbles each time it was used. And yes it did a very good job. I want to thank you for the 5 yr. warranty. This is why I bought this cleaner. The information about what you should not put in the cleaner is great to have thanks for that email. However, that information should have been up front before purchase or came with the cleaner. Because many of things listed I wanted to clean but the follow up email is very appreciated. Judy
customer_reviews.author: toneywho

customer_reviews.title: I Can See Clearly Now!
customer_reviews.text: As a glasses wearer getting the lenses clean is a top priority. I have used soap using my fingers, eye glass cleaner sprays with microfiber towels and they got got the glasses clean, but left a little to be desired. So I tried the Ultrasonic with just distilled water, I was blown away. as how clean and spotless they turned out. I dried with them with a microfiber towel. I cleaned my wife's glasses and she was amazed. It is great and inexpensive.accessory. I have decided to use once a week along with the sprays for quick cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: original and replacement unit both failed
customer_reviews.text: worked really well for 3 months but then it shorted out inside the unit, presumably the heater element since I could see the glow of sparks through the white plastic case just before a final plume of smoke. Increased to 4 Stars based on Excellent Customer Service, however, I just reduced to 1 star yet again because the replacement unit they sent me 6 months ago has now failed... the display/unit will not turn on anymore. This must be a fairly cheap unit. It cleans like a champ but don't expect the equipment to last 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping clean resin off 3D printer parts
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of 3D printing for my business. Recently, I started working with resin printers. After the print is complete, there is still a layeer of uncured sticky resin on most prints. I was looking for an option to help clean these part off easier, as I have developed carpal tunnel in my hands. This ultrasonic cleaner is the answer. Now after I dip the parts in an alcohol bath, i place them in this cleaner with some plain tap water and a drop of dishwater soap. It only takes a couple of minutes and when I take the parts out, they feel clean! Exactly the product you need if you are like me!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this poor product which is not subject to safety requirements at all. In the description of the device as shown, the max volts power is AC100~120V, As soon as I have connected to the electrical supply, the smoke starts to rise from it. This indicates that this product has not been tested and ensure it’s productive, So be careful and keep away from this cheap devices.
customer_reviews.author: ALI

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cleans my night toothguard every day.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, cleans my night toothguard every day. Suits my needs very well, but others might measure what they need to clean and check the size before buying it. I have a feeling some larger jewelry pieces or things the size of a large men's watch might not fit the depth of the water. Not necessarily a criticism: when left plugged in, the water seems to stay warm all day. Not hot, but a little warm. I think I am supposed to unplug it every time, in which case they should build in a switch. Not a deal breaker, just be aware. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fountain Pen Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. As soon as I received the sonic cleaner I put my earrings in it, with just water, no cleaning solution, and they sparkled when they came out. The main reason I got this though was to clean my fountain pens. The nibs and feeders are very hard to get all the ink out of so you have to rinse them numerous times. With this I just rinsed the feeder and nib and then put it in the cleaner. Wow, so easy and quick. No more standing over the sink and rinsing numerous times. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vapors and e-juice mixers.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this to clean my vaping coils and tanks, plus my e-juice mixing equipment. Seems to work great. I use it to clean my coils and tanks when switching flavors. It operates very quiet, and the blue light in the tank is a nice touch. Very simple straight forward controls, easy to use out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Daven

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clean at all. I have a lot of jewelry both gold and silver. I have tried it with water and soap, jewelry cleaner, silver cleaner, and just water. The results are all the same. My silver came clean because of the cleaner not the machine. I am very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work
customer_reviews.text: I used this thing brand new right out of the box, used cold tap water with a drop of dish soap to clean a pair of diamond earring studs and their backings, and they came out just as dirty as before, only wetter.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Hendo

customer_reviews.title: I'm Pleased With The Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once to clean eyeglasses and it performed well. It was easy to use and it did the job. I have not had time to use it on grubby jewelry, coins and such. I am only rating this on lightly soiled items. The seller and Amazon were pressuring me to leave a review. As time goes on and the cleaner is put to hard use I might need to change my rating. Only time will tell. Overall I am pleased with the look and the size. I wanted a small cleaner that is easy to store, this fit the bill. If you are looking for a small device then this one is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Does it come in a travel size too?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this almost daily for a year and it works great! I packed it up in my car for weekly travels to and from NYC-Boston and it functions just the same 1 year later. This may seem obsessive - I like to keep jewelry shining brilliantly like the day I got them. I use warm water with the cleaning solution. For jewelry that I haven't cleaned in ages or ever, I'll run a few cycles. My friends have asked for the amazon links because my engagement and wedding ring shines so brightly. It works exponentially better than a toothbrush haha... =)
customer_reviews.author: P*nk Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive ultrasonic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great little ultrasonic cleaner. Big enough for your glasses or sunglasses but not much more. I cleaned my oven and range control knobs, which have otherwise been nearly impossible to clean. Fantastic little gadget -- makes me realize that I could use an even larger one. This comes with a kind of bridge-shaped plastic holder for waterproof watches and a two-part CD/DVD holder. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: This FM8000WW Ultrasonic Cleaner arrived promptly and in excellent condition. While I've only put probably about 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: This FM8000WW Ultrasonic Cleaner arrived promptly and in excellent condition. While I've only put probably about 2 hours total in cleaning cartridge casings, pocket knives and other odd pieces, including several fossils & arrowheads. While I cannot truthfully say that the unit restores a bright finish to old brass, the amount of 'gunk' residue and the coloration of the wash water is very impressive. This unit should become a very handy household tool, but be aware that it is not large enough for your hand tools and kitchen implements! But for screws, jewelry, and small hobby tools, it's just what Ive needed for some years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrasonic cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size and not too small. I can fit my glasses in there with ease. it comes with baskets so you dont scratch the metal interior. i have anti-glare glasses. no problem with that. dont let the low price scare you off. this machine is awesome. easy to use. What I do is put the first time glasses in there for the longest cycle (600 seconds) with warm water and drop of dish soap. Empty out water and just water for 600 seconds again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimamazon

customer_reviews.title: Famili FM8000 ultra sonic
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a sonic cleaner, did some research and came across the Famili ultra sonic cleaner. I read some of the reviews and decided to go for it. To my surprise it turned out to be a good choice. It works well, and its quiet. It's well built and have a digital panel with counter, start and timer settings. When its cleaning there's a blue LED light on the see through cap to let you know its working. The instructions were well laid out and easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone looking for jewelry sonic cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine has solved some very sensitive issues. I use a mouth guard, and have tried, vinegar, bleach, etc., to keep it clean. Actually did not clean it at the beginning, and then started feeling sick in the mornings. DUH! Learned about this, and it is a lifesaver in many ways. Tried it on the mouth guard, then the power tooth brush tips. GREAT, great, great! Very please with the product, and the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fanatic about taking care of my jewelry, especially my wedding rings. I have uses dozen of less expensive machines for over 20 years. When my last one completely feel apart, literally, I decided to purchase a quality machine, that would not only have a longer life span, and required less effort on my part. Boy was this a fantastic choice! Not only is it a quality machine and so easy to use, it cleans all my jewelry without tangling the necklaces and bracelets. You can adjust the time and it cleans more than just jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Nadine V.

customer_reviews.title: Very weak. Won't clean anything.
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful as an ultrasonic cleaner. Another thing it is made in China not the US as the description claims.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ_POPE

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean my Invisalign retainers reasonably well, especially with a drop of dish soap. However the design that requires you to pick up the entire unit (which is way larger than I anticipated) and tip it over to empty it, while strategically keeping the lid from swinging closed, is really a terrible one. It's very unwieldy and the water always drips down the exterior (as would be expected) so I'm worried that it will eventually get in to the control panel and cause a short. The unit is loud enough to be easily audible from over a dozen feet away. Also, my unit arrived in a box without any instructions whatsoever and fingerprints on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend-multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I clean my jewelry & retainers. I work in a dental office & recommend this to patients all the time for their Invisalign trays or their retainers. I clean my jewelry all the time but after cleaning it in this -it’s amazing to see how much cleaner my jewelry is & all the nasty gunk that is floating at the bottom of the ultrasonic when it’s done. I know this has many more uses but just for the 2 that I use it for I give it 2 thumbs up! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDogLady

customer_reviews.title: We cleaned the first set of glasses using just tap water and it cleaned fine. The second pair was so old and dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cleaner for my glasses, but it could also be used for jewelry. We had it up and running in the matter of a minute or two. We cleaned the first set of glasses using just tap water and it cleaned fine. The second pair was so old and dirty that we added a couple of tablespoons of vinegar. They came out great. Looking at the water in the tank afterwards showed how much dirt and grime that came off of the glasses. I highly recommend this to clean glasses and jewelry. It's easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Q

customer_reviews.title: Measure the width of your eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give it 5 stars but: My eyeglasses barely fit into the plastic basket. Fortunately, the bask has slots and I can just get my glasses into the basket. Using metric measurements, basket is 14.732 cm My eyeglasses are 17.78 cm That's not a huge difference but I paid $800 plus for the glasses and didn't think I'd to squeeze them into the cleaner. There is no on/off switch - you have pull the plug after each use or leave it plugged in. On the plus side - it works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Al Mc

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my Famili Ultrasonic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of glasses and for some reason, I cannot clean them. No matter what I use all it does is streak the lens. With my new sonic cleaner and my iSonic cleaner additive, I just put my glasses in the cleaner for 90 to 180 seconds and they come out totally clean. I don't even dry them off. I just hang them up and let them air dry. I am very pleased with my Famili Ultrasonic cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Teufelshund63

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my fishing reel bearings and my wifes jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This thing was money well spent. I bought it to clean my fishing reel bearings. I place my reel bearings in a small glass jar filled with denatured alcohol. Then, I put the glass jar in the ultrasonic cleaner filled with water. I'm amazed at the amount of gunk that comes out of the bearings. Keeps my reels running smooth. My wife puts her jewelry in the ultrasonic cleaner using water and a drop of dawn dish soap. Her rings come out looking like the day I bought it. She said its the best fishing item I ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Quite What It ISays
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device to help clean old bottle found in archival work. From the description, I thought that this would be a good choice as it apparently would not hurt the bottle, But when I received the device, it was much smaller than I was led to believe. I was unable to but even the smallest of bottles in the well to clean it. So, to just test it, I dropped in some rings and old coins. After the cleaning, I could not tell a difference in the items. It seems that the d3vice has a limited range of what it can clean. I will keep the device hoping that eventually, I will find something that it will clean.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: Does a fantastic job of cleaning my jewelry. They haven't sparkled like this since they were new!!! Quiet and easy to use. The only drawback is that the basket is hard to remove from the machine when it is filled with the solution. It'd be nice if there was a little plastic handle you could attach when you need to remove the basket of jewelry. Otherwise it would get a 5 star GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Lattemocha

customer_reviews.title: Made my jewelry look new!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my gold and diamond jewelry. Filled up the basin with hot water, added a few drops of Dawn dish soap and 2 capfuls of ammonia, let it run for about 20 minutes. My jewelry looks amazing. The first time I tried it I did not add the ammonia, and my results were not as good, though. So the ammonia really helps. Definitely dislodges the dirt, when I took the basket out a lot of dirt particles were left in the bottom of the water. Machine is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: ct_nite

customer_reviews.title: Small chamber, doesn't clean as well as expected
customer_reviews.text: The chamber is small. Some larger glasses (wrap around or aviator) will not be submerged entirely, a requirement. I had to flipped mine after the cycle. That would not be a big deal, but there were areas that I used to a toothbrush to loosen some dirt/grime from hard to reach places - something I wanted to avoid and the reason I bought this product. However, I'm keeping it, it does an average cleaning of things that would require tedious manual attention
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav A

customer_reviews.title: Silent and has a cool blue light that reflects off the water creating neat ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Silent and has a cool blue light that reflects off the water creating neat little ambiance. Easy to clean. Directions were easy enough to understand if you use a little common sense. "Start, Stop, Set"; pretty clear what these functions are for. Kind of has a cheap feel to it, you get what you pay for. Cleaned my gold/white gold rings and diamond/sapphire/gold earrings and it worked well! I did notice there was gunk in the little crevasses of my earring but it just required a wash under the faucet to clear all of that out. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm for what I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: Got this ultrasonic cleaner to actually make liposomal Vitamin C, and glutathione supplement. Works like a charm for what I wanted it to. Causes the lecithin to encapsulate the nutrient of choice and makes it easier to get into the system upon consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Applebyacres

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quite effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to clean several pieces of my good jewelry. My diamond stud earrings as well as a solitaire diamond on a silver chain came out gleaming from the cleaner. I also cleaned a watch and my eyeglasses and was astounded (and really grossed out) by the "yuck" left floating in the cleaning solution. This appears to be a great way to clean and maintain special jewelry without spending excessive time rubbing and polishing by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Things that make you go huh?
customer_reviews.text: I liked what this did to my rings ... love how they shine now! My only problem with this is that the arch that is supposed to hold bracelets and rings is absolutely too tall for the water level! I'm not even sure why they even included it in here it cannot be used! I'm tempted to have my husband cut off the bottom of the Arches see if that works better... But we should not have to cut pieces that are brand-new that are meant to fit into this!
customer_reviews.author: TL in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Possibly deffective unit.
customer_reviews.text: This machine was far more gentle than any other ultrasonic cleaner i've used. it sounded like a faucet running in the other room. placing my finger in the water, i didn't feel any vibrations at all. Every other ultrasonic i've used in the past vibrated so vigorously it was almost painful. i'm not sure if my unit was defective or if it's designed to be very gentle but it just didn't work for my use case.
customer_reviews.author: Masha Zapalova

customer_reviews.title: Not working that great for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for jewelry and cleaning my mouth guard. So far, It has been the same as cleaning my jewelry in a jewelry cleaning solution which was easy already. As far as the moth guard, I am not impressed. Maybe I am doing something wrong but the instructions didn't give a ton of info so I have tried different lengths of time. Using poludent in a glass actually works better.
customer_reviews.author: Katmeowno

customer_reviews.title: Heater?
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this cleaner to clean my vape tanks and to help mix and steep my ejuice it works well the one thing that throws me off is that it gets the water rather warm which is good for cleaning and steeping but it is not advertised as a heating cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Tykhon

customer_reviews.title: Failed to quickly, customer service failed as well
customer_reviews.text: Unit died after a month or two. I contacted the manufacturer's customer service, who promised to send a replacement device. I never received the device and further emails remained unanswered. Disappointing on two account...
customer_reviews.author: FRANCK J FLORENTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this ultrasonic cleaner. It arrived exactly when promised. It is quite roomy and holds several items at a time. It looks attractive too. I cleaned some rings and was thrilled at how sparkly they are. I bought this for cleaning dentures but although they were whiter and shinier and felt really clean it did not remove some built up tartar which I hoped it would do. However I've only used it twice so hopefully more cleaning will do the trick. Regardless I love this machine and am anxious to clean all our eyeglasses and other items. Thank you Famili for this product as well as your follow-up messages and attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make liposomal vitamin C. Was a little worried based on price but It's just the perfect size. It has an adjustable timer so two runs and it's good. I can't recommend about cleaning because that's not what I use it for but she works great for my liposomal VitC
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Unit
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, looks great, I can see the items are cleaner and can see the water begins to get cloudy which tells me it is working, not certain if that is just due to the soak in the solution or the vibration which is not as strong as I would think but the tank will get warm after a few minutes which I liked so I would soak the items and start it again. I think I would still need to take them to a jeweler periodically for a deeper cleaning. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: Not patina friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not wowed, it didn’t do a super job even with the solution that has to be bought separately. DO NOT put your Tiffany jewelry if it has the patina, in this with the cleaning solution. Disappointed that it removed the trade mark color from the jewelry and this was not in the instructions. My pandora bracelets and charms still didn’t look any different after multiple cleanings. It removes dirt, ( I saw remnants at the bottom of the machine), but the jewelry don’t shine.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning vape parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my RDA before rewicking. Holy cow, so good! I used to stand over the sink scrubbing my atty for what felt like forever (probably because I would be nicotine free while doing so). Dropping the pieces into this thing for ten minutes cleans them better than scrubbing for 30+ minutes. This is awesome. It's not the fanciest option but it definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Like professional cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I love good jewelry and love it to sparkle, I wear my jewelry and not keeping it for my grandchildren to wear. :-) Getting very expensive to take to jewelers, so I bought this machine and I do put it through two cycles, but I would compare it or even better then when I paid many bucks for professional cleaning. Great machine, but buy yourself some good cleaner to put a cap full into water in the tank. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki & Chaz Mom

customer_reviews.title: First go was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just watch as the funk drifts off your jewelry! Easy to use and a pretty noticeable difference after first use with my white gold and gemstone jewelry. Not sure how long it will last. It doesn’t have the weight of something that will stand the test of time, but maybe I will be surprised! I used a jewelry cleaner concentrate but the directions say water and soap would also work.
customer_reviews.author: KWN

customer_reviews.title: Worked to clean fountain pen feeds
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically to clean fountain pen feeds which (through my own fault) were clogged due to leaving them too long after using Sailor Nano Sei-boku ink. I used filtered water and a few drops of mild dish detergent and was gratified to see the water change color as the ink particles were dislodged from the pen sections. The pens are writing again. I would note that these are modern pens. I would not do this with vintage pens made with brittle or old materials.
customer_reviews.author: A Texas Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Not very thrilled with the Famili ultrasonic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work very well at all. It barely audible & barely makes a sound & creates small waves rather than the tiny ultrasonic ripples you see on youtube with a good machine. I don't think it's actually ultrasonic. I purchased it because it has lots of good reviews. In any event if it is actually ultrasonic the action is extremely weak. I would not recommend anyone purchasing this unit. Look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: MONICAN

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's larger than I had anticipated, so you can't keep it on the counter. It was even awkward trying to use on the counter, you have to make room. I didn't see much of a difference at first, so I used a couple of cycles. I used a drop of dish soap on the 2nd cleaning and it worked really well. My wedding rings are beautiful and clean. So it does work but the size is a negative for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lovz 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Good for firearms parts and tools in addition to jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: Good product which works well for the small parts of a firearm and parts which get baked on crud. Not large enough for a rifle bolt carrier, but works well on a bolt. Works on pistol barrels as well. It makes cleanup as simple as drying the parts and lubricating them. The carbon deposits flake off, so this can save you some effort. Also very good for cleaning jewelry, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a couple of times for cleaning my glasses and it works pretty well. The anti-glare & scratch resistant coating they put on glasses now makes it very hard to get the smudges off the lens. This helped with that. I used it once with a little Dawn detergent & the next time with just water. I think it was better with Dawn added. I need to check into some other cleaners to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for dental appliances!
customer_reviews.text: This ultrasonic cleaner does a good job of cleaning dental appliances. We have several sets of retainers in our house and now they're all sparkling. We clean the retainers in a solution of water and efferent.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Very easy to setup. I use it to clean harmonicas to keep them sanitized and ready to play. Don’t put a wooden comb harmonica inside, would not be good for the wood. Synthetic combed harmonicas are fine and don’t require disassembly which is nice. I use a diluted mouthpiece cleaning solution and have been very pleased with the results. Well worth the purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around!!
customer_reviews.text: I am more then happy with this jewelry cleaner. I love that it has a 6 minute setting. The basket is large enough that I put 2 pairs of glasses in along with 2 rings and a pair of earring. The water gets super hot so whatever you’re cleaning gets CLEAN! I just use a name brand liquid dish soap and it works great! I highly recommend this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: It's works best after it runs a cycle or two then drain and refill with cleaner, run for 600 sec empty THEN load & clean.
customer_reviews.text: I had a large 6 lLT unit that didn't work as well as this little guy. This one is very quiet and cleans smaller items very well, I use simple green at about 10% to warm tap water for cleaning everything from my 3 3/8" saw blades to my wife's rings. It's works best after it runs a cycle or two then drain and clean the unit and refill with hot tap water for a final rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Brock

customer_reviews.title: I don’t really know, without instructions
customer_reviews.text: My unit came without any instruction. Perhaps it’s really good but without instruction, I don’t know if I’ve done enough. It is sort of awkward emptying the water without making a mess . And it takes up quite a lot of counter room. My purpose for purchasing the product was for cleaning dentures . It seems a bit over-done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alton

customer_reviews.title: Unconvinced
customer_reviews.text: This is up there with the World’s worst instruction. Go to that online Video service YT to figure it out. Tried it but undecided if it does anything. I should have purchased a professional device that does real ultrasonic vibration and cleaning. I will try a few more times before I throw it out
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning retainers and invisaligns
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to clean the retainers and orthodontics for various family members. When you do not get the chance to do through brushing this device removes the plaque. It does a good job however, sometimes when plugging it in you need to wiggles the cord to activate the unit.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Queick and easy
customer_reviews.text: After putting off buying a jewelry cleaner forever I finally researched and bought this one from Famili. It is about as easy to use as it gets, and you get a few extra items that are very useful for stuff other than jewelry cleaning. I would suggest getting two bottle of solution if you are cleaning anything larger than jewelry pieces like glasses for instance. Because there is a larger bin the solution is low. This Ultrasonic cleaner is really fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain what cleaner to purchase. I read reviews, I did online searches, everything I could think of. This had great reviews about the product and the customer service. As soon as I opened the box it was about ready to go. I rinsed it out, popped in my glasses and the nose piece I always struggle to get clean was clean! It was so quiet I wasn't even sure it was working. I love it already.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this cleaner works - very easy to use but I am not a fan of how you have to dump the water out of it after every use. It is a bit cumbersome to do and I am always worried about getting to cord wet or dripping all over the counter top. I'm not sure how they could have designed it better but maybe??
customer_reviews.author: Jeni777

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, great product support
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean up reclaimed/aged hardware (fasteners, etc) and it does a good job, even just at room temperature (manufacturer actually suggests 140F as optimum bath temperature for most situations) using a couple drops of added detergent. Looks nice, too. Received an email from manufacturer 2 days after receiving bath. No sales followup or survey, no request for testimonial, just a "thank you" and lots of information provided about how to get best results from the bath.
customer_reviews.author: David Kushner

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this regularly with my Invisalign aligners to keep them clean daily, and nowadays I use them for my overnight retainers. It's much easier than trying to brush, and cleans out the crevices better than cleaning tablets. I also bought one of these for my father to use on his retainers and he likes it so much he actually brings it with him when he travels.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan S

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning my vape equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product primarily for cleaning vape equipment. It does an awesome job with very little fuss. I will try cleaning up some jewelry in the near future as well. I've used it with just water and my vape parts, my tank glass, parts and even some atomizer coils which after some drying actually vaped like a brand new coil.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: I can't love this enough
customer_reviews.text: I can't love this enough. I am a part-time dog groomer, and I use this to clean my grooming blade between clients. (I have also used it to clean my jewelry, and it comes out sparkling.) For a decent price and great quality, this ultrasonic cleaner is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Used for fountain pens
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for fountain pen cleaning, but it works as advertised. Don't need to buy special ink pen solutions and don't have to wait while the nibs soak overnight. Just fill it with water, then turn it on for the maximum time (just in case of dried ink). Pen comes out clean and ready to refill. And I normally clean 3 pens at a time. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive jewlery cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleaner for it's price. I worked in the jewlery business for years, and this machine does as good a job as a professional model. The plastic basket really helps, as it won't damage precious metals. Some of the larger cleaners are actually to intense for jewlery, and will scratch softer metals. The plastic basket prevents this from happening. The hinged cover and blue light are a nice asthetic touch.
customer_reviews.author: DeKalb Land Man

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it's okay
customer_reviews.text: Ran my wife's engagement band through it a few times and didn't really notice any difference. Granted, the ring itself wasn't horribly dirty (only about 2 year's worth). But neither of us could tell that it was any cleaner when done. Maybe the solution we used just wasn't that great?
customer_reviews.author: ManaPot

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well but suddenly stopped working. It didn't even last a year of weekly use. Very disappointing. UPDATE: 09/04/2018 A few days after my initial review, the company offered to send me another unit. I was very pleased and happy to have a functioning machine again. I was very disappointed to have the replacement machine ALSO die on me. I'm so torn. I loved it when it worked but I'm not sure I can justify the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use - works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this jewelry cleaner for about a week and love it. It couldn’t be easier to use. I put my jewelry and my glasses in it (though not at the same time). I always forget to take my rings off when putting lotion on my hands and my glasses are often smudgy- this works great, even without any soap or cleaning agent, at making them sparkle and shine. Simple to use, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The vendor was great and shipping was fast. The cleaner was great for the price, easy to use and saves money on expensive cleaning solution. Suggested improvements may include a removable tub, more and longer timer options, and hotter temperature. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a ultrasonic bath before, so I do not know what to expect. It seems to work very well on some items, such as jewelry, eyeglasses, and coins, but not so well on my Norelco shaver heads. I had to use a brush on the shaver heads (admittedly, they were very dirty), then run them through the bath a second time. The fact that the lid opens fully-back is an advantage for this model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: updated due to a problem...
customer_reviews.text: updated 10.18.2017 with all the positive reviews was very surprised that the fourth time using it just went and died? the unit went dark, silent part way through a cycle. had to return hoping the next unit will be better. initially i found it worked well, easy to use. nice design and form factor. perfect size for eyeglasses. i use warm water to get the best results.
customer_reviews.author: MikenzCO

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: Assuming mine was defective. It turned on fine and seemed to emit a very light ultrasonic (lighter than my previous units). I turned it on for the 5 minute setting. Came back and the liquid was VERY HOT. This unit is not supposed to heat up. Returned it before something dangerous happened.
customer_reviews.author: SF1226

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle and Shine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to clean my jewlery but did not want to pay a huge price for it. I purchased this one because of the price and ratings. This little jewlery cleaner works perfect for me. My jewlery comes out sparkling in no time. It has easy to read instructions and easy to see buttons. It works for me!
customer_reviews.author: angieB

customer_reviews.title: Product a Failure; short working life span- no refund, no exchange!
customer_reviews.text: this Famili FM8000WW Ultrasonic Bath broke down, burnt out & stopped working on Nov 4th, 2018. I purchased the product on January 24th, 2018. There is a 365-day warranty, so I need to return it. I still have the box it came in, but I misplaced the paperwork, receipts, manual, etc. ; Famili company made it so there is no way for the consumer to take apart the product to examine & repair it. I tried all avenues & could NOT get a refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AMAZINGLY!! So happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! I got home from work and started using it right away I cleaned a bunch of my jewelry n still have ALOT to clean but it won't take as long now with the Ultrasonic cleaner it'll b done better n in no time! So excited I FINALLY bought one of these I've wanted one forever. I'm so happy n impressed with it! Amazing product n fast arrival!!!Thank you!!!! 😀😍💝Will definitely be buying from seller again!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee O'Dell n Troy Probst

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but slightly disappointed that effectiveness appears to diminish over time
customer_reviews.text: My first use of this product, I was astonished at how well it removed dirt from both small metal tools and dental retainers (separately! and with a thorough cleaning of the basin between uses!). However, after 11 months of use it appears that the intensity of the ultrasonic energy has diminished or for some reason not being as efficiently transferred to the item being cleaned. Items previously had the dirt "jump" off of them and into the cleaning solution, but now this no longer occurs. Overall not a bad product but the apparent loss of cleaning "power" restricts my rating to a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excessively dirty items with lots of crevices (see
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Excessively dirty items with lots of crevices (see: my watches' bands and my girlfriend's rope chain necklace) may require more than one cleaning the first time. I added a few drops of dish washing liquid (the legendary blue stuff) and got excellent results on jewelry, watches and eyeglasses. Works silently, which was an unexpected plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: My Liposomal C go-to
customer_reviews.text: I use this for making Liposomal Vitamin C. My favorite feature is that you can set the timer for 4 or 6 minutes so you don't have to start the cycle every minute. Works super well for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Warmuth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean Games-Workshop & Forge World resin parts as well as my vape gear. Works great for all of it. Put a little dawn in and let it run for 5 minutes, rinse off with water, and dry with a towel and the stuff is clean. No more scrubbing with a toothbrush! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: orkira

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great jewelry cleaner. Cleaning liquid was bought separately. Easy to use instructions and especially liked the digital functions. Upon cleaning jewelry, which I hadn't in years, took two (6 minute) cycles to thoroughly clean jewelry. System is perfect size for a bathroom counter or storing under a sink, drawer, etc. Does come with various attachments for watches, rings, etc. Super fast delivery service, would recommend to purchase this item. Gave professional results at the luxury of your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Engels

customer_reviews.title: Cleans carbs spot free since June 2016 :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing for clearing carburetors. I have been using a mix of 2:10 simple-green, 1:10 apple cider vinegar, and 7:10 extremely hot water. 10 minutes on each side and they are as clean as can be.
customer_reviews.author: M/D Jude

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: So many great reviews... but mine did not perform. Maybe I got a bad one but it simply would not clean anything, and I tried at least a dozen coins and jewelry items. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works. I had no idea you had to put a solution in this to make it effective. I tried water first and nothing happened. Since it didn’t come with any solution I just didn’t know you has to create your own. But easy peasy...soap and windex...and boom, cleans glasses, watches, jewelery really well without damaging anything.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after receiving a lot of jewelry after my mom pasted away. I had a good collection of my own that I took to the local jewelry store monthly to have cleaned. This little machine blew me away. I am so very pleased with my purchase and the performance of this device. If it ever stops I will purchase another one. For the price, it cannot be beaten. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TraceyT

customer_reviews.title: Silent little workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything negative about this little workhorse. It gets my expensive glasses sparkling clean. I just put it in the basket and let it do it's job. Rinse and ready to go! My jewelry also comes out beautifully. I did my hubby's watch bands in this too and that was what really impressed me the most. How can they get this dirty? Lol. It is silent, you don't know it is on. If it wasn't for the blue Led light I wouldn't know it was on. I use 1 drop of Dawn dishwashing soap and cool water. Very easy to use and wipe dry. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Fiorillo

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This product works well cleaning jewelry. I gave it 4 stars because I wish it was easier to clean out after you are done using it. It requires you to dump the entire machine. It would be easier if the inside liner was removable. But overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this cleaner. It had excellent reviews but I couldn’t tell it was doing anything. There were a few random bubbles in the water but that was about it. I didn’t see a huge difference in my rings and it didn’t do a thing for my husbands dentures even using dentures cleaner in it. We are returning and looking for a different cleaner. I did like it’s appearance and the nice blue light. The lid seemed a little flimsy at the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: A no-nonsense, solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cleaner for resin 3d printing. It does a spectacular job of getting all the uncured resin off my prints. If I could change one thing, I'd ask for a drain for the bath, because I cant just safely dump contaminated isopropyl alcohol out of the top. Till giving it 5 stars overall though, since my choice of cleaner is outside its intended use. Outside of that, it does an amazing job for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It's okay; does the job; not expensive
customer_reviews.text: This machine cleans my mouthpiece okay. It is big and you have to unplug it after each use to dump the cleaning liquid out. Next time I'll spend more $ ot buy one with a removable bowl. Having said that, for the price, it does the job. Before you buy, decide whether price or convenience is more important, and make your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I just used it with only water and it works fine, three times so far and no problems...Less water seems to create more movement in the water than filling up to the fill line... slight soft buzzing noise inside when active and mini bubbles clinging to things. It made some metal objects like new again, but you can use it for more. It is simple and works. (better with soap but not needed!)
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jewelry cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I haven't used an ultrasonic jewelry cleaner at all, and was skeptical that this one would work. I liked the looks of it, so took a chance and am glad I did. I cleaned a lot of jewelry last weekend, and every piece came out beautiful. I would certainly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, while it lasted. It just stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.R.S

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality jewelry cleaner and I sure got it with this purchase. It does all that it says it will do and then some. My jewelry always looks like it was cleaned at a high end jewelry store. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SanJeff

customer_reviews.title: Not really good at cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This product I suppose can clean the glasses completely and it is the main purpose I bought it. Even after adding dish soap, it would still leave some oil on my lenses. Therefore, I have to use cloth to clean up the oil, which makes me think this machine is little bit useless.
customer_reviews.author: James Z

customer_reviews.title: No affective for it’s intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This machine is not very affective at cleaning. I left stuff in for 25 minutes with no real change. Then I soaked the things in Tarnex for 10 minutes and returned the things to the cleaner for a further ten minutes. This time the things came out about 80% clean. I am tempted to send it back because, as far as I am concerned, it is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Jewelry The Safe Easy Way
customer_reviews.text: As I've already written, when the machine arrived I tried it out on a few pieces and was so impressed I couldn't stop until I had cleaned all my jewelry. The machine seemed gentle on my jewelry and was very easy to use. I definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Throw in a little soap and water and you're ready to clean jewelery, glasses, or other small trinkets. Fairly small but powerful. I used this to clean my glasses frames (after removing the lenses) and it knocked off three years of dirt and grime in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Theta Zero

product_meta.title: Famili FM8000WW Ultrasonic Polishing Jewelry Cleaner with Digital Timer for Cleaning Eyeglasses Rings, Dentures, Retainers, and Mouth Guards

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
